title: Textile, 1970–79
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: resist printed on plain weave
inscribed: Printed on one edge: "0535 Veritable Wax Hollandais"
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 98.5 x 120 cm (38 3/4 x 47 1/4 in.)
description: Imitation batik of wax printed cotton with a half drop repeat in dark blue and white of Indonesian style animal, bird and floral motifs on a dotted background.
